text.qlabel-small: QLabel#small { font-size: 6px; text-align: center; font-family: Alasassy Caps; }
text.qlabel-medium: QLabel#medium { font-size: 8px; text-align: center; font-family: Alasassy Caps; }
text.qlabel-large: QLabel#large { font-size: 10px; text-align: center; font-family: Alasassy Caps; }
text.qlabel-Large: QLabel#Lmall { font-size: 12px; text-align: center; font-family: Alasassy Caps; }
